mapper.select: select id, uuid, title, creator_id, date, place, start, end, type, members, desc, instance_id, status, create_time from linework.tb_meeting where id = #{id}
select id, uuid, title, creator_id, date, place, start, end, type, members, desc, instance_id, status, create_time from linework.tb_meeting limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into linework.tb_meeting(uuid, title, creator_id, date, place, start, end, type, members, desc, instance_id, status, create_time) values (#{uuid}, #{title}, #{creatorId}, #{date}, #{place}, #{start}, #{end}, #{type}, #{members}, #{desc}, #{instanceId}, #{status}, #{createTime})

insert into linework.tb_meeting(uuid, title, creator_id, date, place, start, end, type, members, desc, instance_id, status, create_time) values
(#{entity.uuid}, #{entity.title}, #{entity.creatorId}, #{entity.date}, #{entity.place}, #{entity.start}, #{entity.end}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.members}, #{entity.desc}, #{entity.instanceId}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime})

insert into linework.tb_meeting(uuid, title, creator_id, date, place, start, end, type, members, desc, instance_id, status, create_time) values
(#{entity.uuid}, #{entity.title}, #{entity.creatorId}, #{entity.date}, #{entity.place}, #{entity.start}, #{entity.end}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.members}, #{entity.desc}, #{entity.instanceId}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime})
on duplicate key update uuid = values(uuid) , title = values(title) , creator_id = values(creator_id) , date = values(date) , place = values(place) , start = values(start) , end = values(end) , type = values(type) , members = values(members) , desc = values(desc) , instance_id = values(instance_id) , status = values(status) , create_time = values(create_time)
mapper.update:
update linework.tb_meeting
uuid = #{uuid},
title = #{title},
creator_id = #{creatorId},
date = #{date},
place = #{place},
start = #{start},
end = #{end},
type = #{type},
members = #{members},
desc = #{desc},
instance_id = #{instanceId},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
where id = #{id}
